name: Card Jump
description:
This game is a mix between a plateformer and a card game.

You can jump,dash and climb (yes there is a little bit of inspiration from celeste).

You start a level with cards that correspond to the actions (jump/climb/dash) that you can make. Doing an action consume one of his corresponding card. When you run out of a type of cards you can not longer do the corresponding action.

Example : if you start a level with 1 jump card and perform 1 jump then you lose your card and can not longer make a jump.

Controlls : 

WASD/Arrows for controlling the character.Space for jumping. E for dashing.  Hold Shift for climbing.

But you can also (and I recommand it) play with a controller.

Others informations :

No assets use.

Music : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=88SUl3O7rxE&t=2s

And please forgot the horrible design of my game, my skills in drawing are absolute garbage.
